about.content1: Zebra Lounge - it's a unique space that combines the wonderful passion of the hookah, the fragrant of real Chinese tea and the variety of exotic cocktails. We have the "smokest" hookah, the fascinating board game, the greatest alcoholic cocktails. This is combined with rhythmic music and a friendly atmosphere. Zebra this is your resting place.
about.content2: Our establishment is located in the heart of the stone jungle - Maidan Nezalezhnosti. We welcome you every day from noon to midnight
